entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • A lot of time spent in Result execution with eventual exception in kestrel #57953
  • `dotnet watch`: No hot reload changes to apply. #57951
  • The connection was aborted by the application. At HttpRequestStream.ReadAsyncInternal #57950
  • [Identity] Support generating user tokens outside of web applications #57947
  • Perf regression: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #57945
  • Quarantine Http1Connection_RequestEndsWithIncompleteReadAsync #57944
  • Blazor WebAssembly Standalone App targeting .net 9 runs in production mode when started from VS in debug mode #57941
  • Application DLL cannot be loaded once hosting model is switched OutOfProcess #57949
  • Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Server Unable to find service type 'Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescriptions.IDocumentProvider' in dependency injection container. #57939
  • OpenIdConnectProtocolException: IDX21314: OpenIdConnectProtocol requires the jwt token to have an 'aud' claim. #57938
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #57937
  • ProblemDetails is not showing the trace id when AddProblemDetails is set before AddControllers #57935

Closed

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct, ApiCrudGetProductDetails #57928
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #57875
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer Old IdentityModel reference breaks Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens behavior. #57940
  • HttpRequest.BodyReader.ReadAsync stops host from responding under load (from Crank) with body > 5000 bytes #57720
  • JsonPatchDocument `.ApplyTo(...)` raises `JsonPatchException` for unknown Properties instead of transparently mapping them to `JsonExtensionData` #57711
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #57926

PullRequests

Created

  • Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #57952
    area-infrastructure
  • Quarantine and fix Http1Connection_RequestEndsWithIncompleteReadAsync #57946
    area-networking
  • Quarantine ServerShutsDownGracefullyWhenMaxRequestBufferSizeExceeded #57943
    area-networking
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57942
    area-infrastructure
  • Check for sentinel value when setting HTTP/3 error code #57934
    area-networking

Merged

  • [Templates] Fix template scripts, make them more flexible and robust #57841
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • [TEST] Upload windows event logs #57923
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • Fix IAsyncEnumerable controller methods to allow setting headers #57924
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc
  • Note fire-and-forget status of HubConnection event tasks #57779
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add public method to QuickGrid to close column options UI #57904
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
